page.title: 18TRANSPORT HURN AIRPORT BUSES
page.content:
Near{Ferndown}there is a small airport called{Bournemouth Hurn Airport.}It is very busy, especially in summer. There are scheduled services to and from the Channel Islands, domestic flights, and flights for package holidays abroad. Flowers, fruit and vegetables are flown in and taken quickly to the shops to be sold. On many occasions, when other airports are closed because of bad weather, passenger aircraft are diverted to Hurn from the major airports. My Dad runs a helicopter charter service from Hurn.
There are many regular{bus services through Ferndown to towns nearby. For children who live further away from school, there is a special school bus service. It is half fare for children under 14. There are single and double-decker buses.
